Generated Narrative: ValueSet be-vs-diabetes-observation-code

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version http://snomed.info/sct/11000172109
    CodeDisplay
    141191000172105Percentage of time above level 1 hyperglycaemic threshold to total continuous glucose monitoring time using minimally-invasive continuous glucose monitoring device
    141201000172108Percentage of time above level 2 hyperglycaemic threshold to total continuous glucose monitoring time using minimally-invasive continuous glucose monitoring device
    141231000172103Percentage of time in target glucose range to total glucose monitoring time using minimally-invasive continuous glucose monitoring device
    141211000172106Percentage of time below level 1 hypoglycaemic threshold to total continuous glucose monitoring time using minimally-invasive continuous glucose monitoring device
    141221000172101Percentage of time below level 2 hypoglycaemic threshold to total continuous glucose monitoring time using minimally-invasive continuous glucose monitoring device
    141151000172102Mean number of point-of-care capillary blood glucose measurements per day
    141171000172109Number of clinically significant hypoglycaemic episodes recorded by continuous glucose monitoring device
    141141000172104Frequency of hyperglycaemic episodes
    365845005Hemoglobin A1C - diabetic control finding
    141161000172100Mean substance concentration of glucose in capillary blood using minimally-invasive continuous glucose monitoring device
    141121000172108Coefficient of variation
    141131000172106Days sensor worn
    141181000172107Percentage of data captured
    141241000172105Glucose management index
